Name: Smoking Bull
Review Text: Great food. Awesome atmosphere. Dana was an awesome server. The deep fried mushrooms were absolutely delicious. Steaks cooked perfectly. I tried the red snapper(not blackened) and it was awesome. It's not cheap but worth every penny.

Name: Smoking Bull
Review Text: My First time eating there it was clean and the atmosphere was nice and the services we're great and the food was good plan to go back.

Name: Smoking Bull
Review Text: VERY HIGH PRICED. Nothing was priced and we were very surprised to have to pay 100.00 for a steak dinner for two. The waitress was very nice and she did a wonderful job. However, our drinks were served to us in foam cups. The steaks were ‚Ä¶

Name: Smoking Bull
Review Text: First experience at The Smoking Bull great! The doors opened up a little after 4:30pm and we were seated right away, though not a lot of space for motorized wheelchair patrons. ‚Ä¶

Name: Smoking Bull
Review Text: Friendly service. Food was fantastic. Great atmosphere, highly recommend dining here....

Name: Smoking Bull
Review Text: The rib eye was very good. Cooked perfectly! Price was a little high but I will definitely be back.. Thanks

Name: Smoking Bull
Review Text: I see that in this country and AR skin color does still matter in the south. If you are a african american don't go to this establishment. Poor service and poor quality of food is what you will receive. America and some people will never change!

Name: Smoking Bull
Review Text: The Steak i had was not worth $35 and the experience wasnt either.  When my wife and i were done the waiter came back with a bill for $110.  All im saying is never again.

Name: Smoking Bull
Review Text: I got the 10 ounce ribeye and salad and loaded baked potato which was the best loaded baked potato I've ever eaten and the steak was cooked to perfection! The service was fantastic and this was a pretty busy night as they had a band playing ‚Ä¶

Name: Smoking Bull
Review Text: A wonderful meal with friends! Our server was kind and prompt. We ordered onion rings, fried mushrooms, steak, chicken fried steak, fish, and shrimp. It was all cooked perfectly! For dessert was ordered the key lime pie and turtle ‚Ä¶

Name: Smoking Bull
Review Text: Worth the short drive to Emerson from Magnolia. The Bull burger is great and so is the fish!

Name: Smoking Bull
Review Text: One of the best burgers I have ever eaten. The seasoned fries were so good. Our waitress was awesome.  I love this place.

Name: Smoking Bull

Review Text: The waitress was awesome and the food was 10 stars good. I highly recommend everyone eat here. I am coming back for some more awesome food.

Review Text: Service was excellent, the food was good BUT the price was very outrageous. We've been there several times but tonight OMG price was ridiculous just for 2 adults. We both got steak and we had to pay for everything extra, like bake potatoes ‚Ä¶

Name: Smoking Bull
Review Text: Best Ribeye I have ever had. Great service, our food came fast and cooked perfect.

Name: Smoking Bull
Review Text: Sitting outside by the fireplace made our experience more homey and added a warm, cozy feel. No wait time for us at 5:15pm. The band was starting to set up as we were leaving so we missed out on that treasure. Steak had a wonderful flavor. ‚Ä¶

Name: Smoking Bull
Review Text: We dined about 2 in the afternoon and disappointed that baked potatoes & fresh rolls weren't available until later in the day. Steak with no baked potatoes?? No ma'am. Food was good. Dining companions steak was overcooked, but flavorful. ‚Ä¶

Name: Smoking Bull
Review Text: Great all around place to eat with your spouse or a group of friends. Friendly and courteous staff with good food. Try the crab and shrimp dip for an appetizer! The fried tenderloin pork chop was great with a loaded bake potatoe! Try it out! A short drive for quality food!

Name: Smoking Bull
Review Text: I got the crawfish pasta, and it was delicious! Definitely recommend. My friend got the CBR, and it was huge and looked super delicious. Good service. Kind wait staff.

Name: Smoking Bull
Review Text: First time there and we came with a party of 25! Food was fantastic and we had the best waitress ever! To keep all our orders straight and no mix up was amazing! And did it with a smile!üòç We will definitely be back!

Name: Smoking Bull
Review Text: The food here is amazing! My favorite is the Chicken bacon ranch sandwich. The service here is great. The wait isn't too long and the people are friendly. This place should be a part of my regular eating habits! You can't go just once. I recommend this place to everyone who enjoys a great meal with friendly people around!

Name: Smoking Bull
Review Text: Great food, awesome employees, and excellent atmosphere to relax and make memories with friends and family üòä

Name: Smoking Bull
Review Text: Excellent food! Known for the burgers. Friendly servers. Small town charm. Indoor and outdoor seating options. Live music. Alcohol served. Casual atmosphere. Free parking. Try the banging bull shrimp and some sweet tea!

Name: Smoking Bull
Review Text: Service was fantastic, and food was very good. Other Columbia County restaurant owners should visit here, and see how successful a well run restaurant can be. The only shortcoming was they could use some additions to their beer list.

Name: Smoking Bull
Review Text: First time. Jennifer was our waitress. She is fantastic. I suggest her. I got Chicken Fried steak. Shared with my daughter and still leftovers. Freshly made.  Can't wait to go back.

Name: Smoking Bull
Review Text: Very good food, but we were seated for 90 minutes before our meals came. The  very pleasant waitress said that's typical. We were given $10 gift cards to use next time  and that was nice.

Name: Smoking Bull
Review Text: Great place to eat - steak was fantastic, as was the rest of the food. Courteous service and friendly folks; we will definitely be back again and again!

Name: Smoking Bull
Review Text: I like this place better every time I go

Name: Smoking Bull
Review Text: The Smokin' Bull was a delightful find for Magnolia area residents and visitors. The food selection and service was great. While those are important factors, without great food they don't amount to much.  The Smokin' Bull came through ‚Ä¶

Name: Smoking Bull
Review Text: Had fried catfish and shrimp. It was delicious. My wife had ribeye and she said it was great. Waitress was very attentive. Can't wait for the next meal there.

Name: Smoking Bull
Review Text: Food and service is phenomenal! May have to wait a few minutes to get seated, but the food is well worth the wait!

Name: Smoking Bull

Name: Smoking Bull
Review Text: We love The Smokin' Bull! It's a little more expensive than I'd like but between the homemade southern cooking, the awesome service, and the live music on Saturday nights;  this place is destined to become a family favorite in short order!

Review Text: I live here in Emerson and I pretty much keep to myself. And judge restaurants steaks, burgers, and hospitality on a personal level, They have all three. They remember you when you go in and they make it feel like home. I never called it ‚Ä¶
